summary: Targeting Technical roles with an organization of high repute with a scope of improving knowledge and further career growth.

responsibilities: Developed multiple ASP.NET Core Web APIs and seamlessly integrated them into React.js-powered frontends.
Utilized a clean MVC code structure, MySql Database and efficient state management, the applications guarantee a responsive and professional user experience.

academic_projects.name: Football Analysis System
academic_projects.summary: Developed an advanced Football Analysis system that processes live football video streams to detect players, calculate ball possession, and measure player speed.
responsibilities: Trained a sophisticated dataset with YOLO to detect and identify players on the field, excluding those on the sidelines.
Utilized K-means clustering to classify players into two teams based on jersey color, ensuring accurate team identification.
Implemented a dynamic red tracker to highlight the player in possession of the ball, enabling precise calculation of ball possession for each team.

academic_projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
academic_projects.summary: Developed a movie recommendation system that suggests movies based on user ratings and genres, providing personalized recommendations tailored to individual preferences.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a movie recommendation system using both content-based filtering and collaborative filtering approaches.
The collaborative filtering approach processes a matrix of user ratings through the k-nearest neighbors algorithm to generate an array of movies most similar to the user's preferences.
The content-based filtering approach analyzes movie genres to create a cosine similarity matrix, which compares movies based on their genres and provides recommendations based on similarity.

academic_projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline
academic_projects.summary: Implemented a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub, CircleCI, and Netlify.
responsibilities: Implemented automated code builds and testing using CircleCI, enhancing the development process by ensuring seamless and reliable updates.
Deployed applications on Netlify, optimizing production development for efficiency.
Ensured continuous integration, which minimized manual intervention, improved code quality, and accelerated deployment speed.
